# Arcane Feedback (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (paper Mobius strip)

**Range:** Personal

**Area:** 60-ft.-radius emanation centered on you

**Duration:** Concentration, up to 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** 1001 Spells (Rite Publishing), pg. 63

This spell creates a field that hampers spellcasting (including the spell’s caster) for the duration of the spell. Any time a creature (including the caster) tries to cast a spell or use a spell-like ability within the area of the emanation, the spell fails as if countered and explodes in the creature’s face, dealing 1d6 points of force damage per spell level of the spell, up to a maximum of 9d6 force damage. Thus a failed attempt to cast *[[Delayed Blast Fireball (Spell)|delayed blast fireball]]* would deal a 7d6 points of force damage to the creature. This field has no effect on *[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*, *[[Dispel Magic, Greater (Spell)|greater dispel magic]]* or *[[Antimagic Field (Spell)|antimagic field]]*.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *caster's feedback* to *arcane feedback* for campaign continuity.
